actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: Makes two attacks: one bite and one stinger.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Large or smaller target must make DC 19 DEX save or be swallowed (blinded/restrained, total cover, takes 21 (6d6) acid at start of worm's turns). If it takes 30+ damage in a turn from inside, DC 21 CON save to regurgitate at end of turn; on death, swallowed creatures can exit using 20 ft. movement, prone.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
actions.description: Target DC 19 CON save or take 42 (12d6) poison, half on success.
